title: 1.3 - rand
description: The |*rand()*| function generates a random real number between 0 and 1, but what if we want real numbers in a different range? Use the |*rand*| function to generate a *4x5* matrix with random real numbers *between 5 and 10*. Store your result in the variable "mat".
template:
% generate a 4x5 matrix with  real numbers between 5 and 10
mat =
solution:
% generate a 4x5 matrix with  real numbers between 5 and 10
mat = rand(4,5) * 5 + 5;
